SA01mkarmviu:95_56: yathā cāryamahendreṇa siṃhaladvīpe vibhīṣaṇaprabhṛtayo rākṣasāḥ samaye sthāpitā deśaś cābhiprasāditaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:95_57: yathā cādhyardhaśatake sūtra āryapūrṇena śūrpārake nagare pañcopāsakaśatāni [MKV_64] abhiprasāditāni.
SA01mkarmviu:95_59: yathā ca bhagavān pañcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vihāyasā tatra gato janakāyaś cābhiprasāditaḥ.

SA01mkarmviu:95_61: .. ntar yaḥ kaścid vinīto bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vopāsako vopāsikā vā sarve te bhikṣubhir eva vinītāḥ.

SA01mkarmviu:96_1: XXXIII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ sukhito bhūtvā paścād duḥkhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:96_2: ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ yācitaḥ samānaḥ pūrvaṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratijānīte pramudito dadāti.
SA01mkarmviu:96_4: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:96_5: paścāt tasya te bhogāḥ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti.
SA01mkarmviu:96_6: sa paścād daridro bhavati. yathāryagopakaḥ. tena kila kakucchande samyaksaṃbuddhe bhikṣusaṃghasya godhenur dattā.
SA01mkarmviu:96_7: sa paścāt parair garhito na sādhukṛteyaṃ datteti.
SA01mkarmviu:96_8: tena cittaṃ pradūṣitam. sa yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra mahādhano bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:96_10: paścime bhave 'pi rājagṛhe nagare [MKV_66] 'nyatarasmin gṛhe pratyājātaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:96_12: anena mātā māritā jāyamānena mūlanakṣatre jāto 'yaṃ mā nirmūlaṃ kulaṃ kariṣyaty amaṅgalo 'yam iti mātrā sārdhaṃ śmaśāne utsṛṣṭaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:96_13: tatrāpi ca mātur ekastanāt kṣīraṃ pragharati tenaiva puṇyānubhāvena.
SA01mkarmviu:96_15: etac ca sarvam anupūrveṇa bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ kathitam.
SA01mkarmviu:96_16: evam anena pūrvaṃ kṣīradhenuḥ prasādajātena dattā paścād vipratisārī saṃvṛttaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:96_17: tasyedaṃ karmaphahm. yas tv asau pūrvakaś cittaprasādas tad evāsya mokṣabījam.
SA01mkarmviu:96_18: yathā ca campāyāṃ mahānagaryām īśvaro gṛhapatiputraḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:96_19: tena bhṛtyānāṃ haste sarvaṃ dhanaṃ caturdiśaṃ bāṇijyāya preṣitam.
SA01mkarmviu:96_22: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ sukhito bhūtvā paścād duḥkhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:97_0: XXXIV. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ duḥkhito bhūtvā paścāt sukhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:97_1: ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ samādāya yācitaḥ samānaḥ pratijānīte.
SA01mkarmviu:97_2: kṛcchreṇa dadāti. dattvā tu dānaṃ paścāt prītim utpādayati.
SA01mkarmviu:97_4: tasya paścāt te bhogā abhivṛddhiṃ gacchanti.
SA01mkarmviu:97_6: tena kila rājagṛhe [MKV_67] śyāmākataṇḍulabhaktam upariṣṭhasya pratyekabuddhasya piṇḍapāto dattaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_7: taddivasam eva rājñā tuṣṭenāṣṭau mahāgrāmā dattāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_8: tac ca paścimakaṃ dāridryam. yathā tasyaiva vyākaraṇaṃ pūrvāparāntake sūtre.
SA01mkarmviu:97_9: yathā ca śrāvastyāṃ daridrapuruṣeṇa svajanaphalāni yācitvā kṣetraṃ nītāni karṣaṇārthe.
SA01mkarmviu:97_10: tasya patnyā paragṛhe bhājanam ādhāya vrīhim ānīya bhaktaṃ siddham.
SA01mkarmviu:97_12: amukasya gṛhapater gṛhe prathamaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ grahītavyam iti.
SA01mkarmviu:97_13: te ca sarve yathānupūrvaṃ tatra gatāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_16: tayā striyā jātaprasādayā pariśiṣṭaṃ bhaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavato dattaṃ praṇidhānaṃ ca karoti.
SA01mkarmviu:97_17: anena bhagavan kuśalamūlena mā me bhūyaḥ kadācid dāridryaṃ syād iti.
SA01mkarmviu:97_20: tac chrutvā rājāprasenajit tasmin gṛhe gataḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_21: tenoktam. asmākaṃ pūrvarājabhis te dīnārāḥ sthāpitā iti.
SA01mkarmviu:97_23: aṅgāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. rājñā bhūyo gṛhapater dattāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_24: suvarṇaṃ saṃvṛttam. athā rājā prasenajid vismayajātaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:97_25: gatvā bhagavato nivedayati. bhagavān āha. puṇyanirjātā gṛhapater na grāhyā.
SA01mkarmviu:97_27: evam eṣa yadā dātā bhavati duḥkhena yācitaḥ samānaḥ pratijānīte.
SA01mkarmviu:97_28: duḥkhena [MKV_68] dadāti dattvā ca cittaṃ prasādayati.
SA01mkarmviu:97_29: tena hetunā pūrvaṃ daridro bhūtvā paścān mahādhano bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:97_30: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ duḥkhito bhūtvā paścāt sukhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:98_0: XXXV. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca sukhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:98_1: ucyate. ihaikatyo dānaṃ yācitaḥ sa prahṛṣṭaḥ pratijānīte prahṛṣṭo dadāti.
SA01mkarmviu:98_3: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu.
SA01mkarmviu:98_4: atra bhadrike nagare miṇḍhakaprabhṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ dānapatīnāṃ vipāko vaktavyaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:98_5: taiḥ kila tagaraśikhī pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍapātena pratipādilaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:98_7: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca sukhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:99_0: XXXVI. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca duḥkhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:99_2: sa dānaṃ na dadāti. na ca tena kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:99_6: tadā ca śrāvastyām ikṣudvādaśī nāma bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:99_7: bhagavatā cekṣūṇi labdhāni. anyatarasmin gṛhadvāre daridradārakas tiṣṭhati.
SA01mkarmviu:99_9: bhagavataikaṃ dattam. sa [MKV_69] bhūyo yācatiḥ bhagavān āha.
SA01mkarmviu:99_10: vatsa. ucyatām. necchāmīti te bhūyo dāsyāmīti.
SA01mkarmviu:99_11: sa prāha. mayā bhagavan na kadācin necchāmīty uktaṃ pūrvam.
SA01mkarmviu:99_12: bhagavān āha. vatsa. ucyatāṃ necchāmi bhagavan sarvāṇi dāsyāmīti.
SA01mkarmviu:99_14_0: bhagavatā sarvāṇi dattāni. athāryānandaḥ pṛcchati. bhagavan kim idam. bhagavān āha.
SA01mkarmviu:99_14_1: na kadācid eṣa ānanda rūparasagandhasparśādīnāṃ tṛptapūrvo 'bhavat necchāmīti vā
SA01mkarmviu:99_15: tad etasya vacanaṃ tasya necchāmīti hetubhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati.
SA01mkarmviu:100_0: necchāmīty eṣa vyāhāro na kadācid udīritaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:100_1: kuto rūpāṇi śabdāś ca gandhāḥ sparśāś ca vai kutah.
SA01mkarmviu:100_2: ity evaṃ prārthayann eṣa nityaṃ bhramati bāliśaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:100_4: hetur alpecchatā yaiṣā sa evāsya bhaviṣyati.
SA01mkarmviu:101_0: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pūrvaṃ ca paścāc ca duḥkhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:102_0: XXXVII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati matsarī.
SA01mkarmviu:102_1: ucyate. ihaikatyenālpamātraṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati śīlavati pātrabhūte na tu punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:102_2: yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu.
SA01mkarmviu:102_3: tena dānaviśeṣeṇa yat tena punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ na bhavati sa tena karmaṇā matsarī bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:102_6: atha tasya gṛhadvāre tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddha āgataḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:102_7: tasya bhikṣā dattā. tena dṛṣṭvādīyamānā tena kṣavaṇaye na ca bhikṣā dattā.
SA01mkarmviu:102_9: sa tena karmaṇā divyamānuṣyakāḥ saṃpattayo 'nubhūya śrāvastyām agrakulikaputraḥ pratyājāto matsarī kālagataḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:102_10: tasya dravyaṃ rājñā prasenajitāputrakaṃ gṛhītvā śatavarge āgame prasenajitsaṃyukteṣu rājopakīrṇakaṃ nāma sūtram.
SA01mkarmviu:102_14: bhagavān āha. katīyaṃ mahārāja gṛhapater dravyaṃ gṛhītam.
SA01mkarmviu:102_15: sa āha. śataṃ bhagavan śatasahasrāṇāṃ yad āhataṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ dravyam aparimitam anāhatam.
SA01mkarmviu:102_16: bhagavān āha. idaṃ tasya mahārāja saptamam aputrakaṃ dravyagrahaṇam.
SA01mkarmviu:102_17: yat tena tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍapātena pratipāditaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:102_18: tad asya karma parikṣīṇam. anyac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na kṛtam.
SA01mkarmviu:102_19: tenādya prathamāyāṃ rātryāṃ mahāraurave narake pacyate.
SA01mkarmviu:103_3: yat tena kṛtaṃ bhavati kalyāṇam atha pāpakam
SA01mkarmviu:103_4: tad dhi tasya svakaṃ bhavati tac ca ādāya gacchati.
SA01mkarmviu:105_0: XXXVIII. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro bhavati tyāgavān.
SA01mkarmviu:105_1: ucyate. ihaikatyena pudgalena bahu dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:105_4: sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate daridro bhavati tyāgavān tena dānābhyāsena.
SA01mkarmviu:105_5: yat tu tenāpātrabhūteṣu dānaṃ dattaṃ tena daridraḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:105_6: yathā śrāvastyāṃ tatra vinaye tantravāyasya nidānaṃ varṇayanti.
SA01mkarmviu:105_7: sa tyāgavān daridraś ca. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastam.
SA01mkarmviu:105_8: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro bhavati tyāgavān.
SA01mkarmviu:106_0: XXXIX. katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati tyāgavān.
SA01mkarmviu:106_1: ucyate. ihaikatyena pudgalena bahu dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati śīlavatsu pātrabhūteṣu.
SA01mkarmviu:106_5: yat tu tena punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastaṃ tena tyāgavān bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:106_6: yathānāthapiṇḍadena kila krakucchande samyaksaṃbuddhe jetavanaṃ niryātitam.
SA01mkarmviu:106_7: vihāraś ca kāritaḥ. evaṃ kanakamunau samyaksaṃbuddhe kāśyape sarvārthasiddhe ca.
SA01mkarmviu:106_9: idaṃ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgala āḍhyo bhavati tyāgavān.
SA01mkarmviu:107_0: XL. katamasya pudgalasyāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ na karma.
SA01mkarmviu:107_1: ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo narakāc cyuto narakeṣūpapadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:107_5: yathā varṣākārasya brāhmaṇasya punaḥ punaḥ kālagatasya markaṭopapattiḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_6: yathā kāśmīrāyāṃ pūrvoktasya gṛhapateḥ punaḥ punaḥ paśūpapattiḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_7: yathā ca śrāvastyāṃ kaścid daridraḥ kuṭumbī kālagataḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_8: tasya gṛhadvāre balīvardo vraṇībhūtena skandhena tiṣṭhati.
SA01mkarmviu:107_9: sa gṛha āsaktacittaḥ kuṭumbī tasya balīvardasya skandhe kṛmiḥ pratyājātaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_14: yathā cāryamahāmaudgalyāyano magadheṣu bhaikṣyaṃ paryaṭamāno 'nyatamagṛhadvāram anuprāptaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_15: tasmiṃś ca gṛhe gṛhapatiḥ patnīsahito matsyamāṃsaprakāreṇa bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte.
SA01mkarmviu:107_16: putreṇa paryaṅkagatena kṛṣṇā cāsya kukkurī puraḥ sthitā.
SA01mkarmviu:107_19: gamyatām ārya nāsti kāścid atra yo bhikṣāṃ dāsyati.
SA01mkarmviu:107_20: sa khalu saṃprasthitaḥ. taśmiṃś ca gṛhadvāre deśāntarābhyāgatāḥ puruṣā vidvāṃsaḥ pūrvasthitāḥ te taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ prāptāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_21_0: aho āścaryam ayaṃ nāma ṛddhimatām agryaḥ yena nandopanandau nāgarājānau vinītau vaijayantaś
SA01mkarmviu:107_21_1: ca prāsādo vāmapādāṅguṣṭhena kampitaḥ śakro vismāpitaḥ trisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ nimeṣāntaracārī
SA01mkarmviu:107_23: vatsa. naitad āścaryam. puruṣā ūcuḥ. atha kim anyad āścaryaṃ vismayakāraṇam.
SA01mkarmviu:107_24: sa uvāca. ya eṣa gṛhapatir matsyamāṃsaprakārair bhojanaṃ [MKV_73] bhuṅkte eṣa matsyaḥ asya gṛhapateḥ pitā.
SA01mkarmviu:107_25: tena yā eṣāsya gṛhasya pṛṣṭhataḥ puṣkariṇī ataḥ prabhūtamatsyān uddhṛtyoddhṛtya bhakṣitāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_29: yāpy eṣā kukkurī asyaiva gṛhapater mātā.
SA01mkarmviu:107_30: etayā lobhadoṣeṇa na kiṃcid dānaṃ dattam.
SA01mkarmviu:107_31: na ca śīlaṃ sevitam. kevalaṃ kulavaṃśārthaṃ dravyaṃ paripālitam.
SA01mkarmviu:107_32: sātraiva gṛhe āsaktacittā kālagatā kukkurīṣu pratyājātā.
SA01mkarmviu:107_34: sarvāṃ ca rātrīṃ gṛhaṃ samantāt paryaṭati.
SA01mkarmviu:107_35: mātra kaścit praviśed iti. atha yas tv eṣa putraḥ paryaṅke kṛtaḥ eṣo 'syā eva striyāḥ pracchannabhartā anena ca gṛhapatinā śrutam.
SA01mkarmviu:107_37: sa eṣa gṛhapatir grāmāntara gamanavyapadeśena gṛhān niṣkrāntaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_39: anena gṛhapatinā rātrāv āgamya puruṣo ghātitaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_40: so 'syām eva striyām āraktacittas tenaiva snehānubandhena kukṣav upapannaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:107_41: paśya vatsa yaḥ pitā caiva tasya sa maṃsāni bhakṣayati.
SA01mkarmviu:107_42: yā mātā janitrī tasyā matsyakaṇtakāsthikāni dadāti.
SA01mkarmviu:107_43: yaś ca śatruḥ kruddhena māritaḥ pāradārikaḥ taṃ paryaṅkena dhārayati.
SA01mkarmviu:107_45: idam atrāścaryakāraṇam. atha sa bhikṣur mahāmaudgalyāyana etad evārthaṃ sarvaṃ paścimajanatāsaṃvejanārthaṃ ślokena saṃgṛhītavān.
SA01mkarmviu:108_0: pitur maṃsāni khādate mātuḥ kṣipati kaṇṭakān
SA01mkarmviu:108_1: bhāryā jāraṃ ca poṣeti loko mohatamovṛtaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:109_0: ayaṃ pudgalo yasyāyuḥ kṣīṇaṃ na karma.
SA01mkarmviu:110_1: XLI. katamasya pudgalasya karma kṣīṇaṃ nāyuḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:110_2: ucyate. yaḥ pūrvaṃ sukhito bhūtvā paścād duḥkhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:110_3: pūrvaṃ yo duḥkhito bhūtvā paścāt sukhito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:111_0: XLII. katamasya pudgalasya karma kṣīṇam āyuś ca.
SA01mkarmviu:111_1: ucyate. yaḥ pudgalo narakāc cyutas tiryakṣūpapadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:111_4: tataś cyuto deveṣūpapadyate. yathā śrāvastyāṃ vaṇikputra udyānaṃ gataḥ puṣpahetoḥ patnīvacanenāśokavṛkṣam ārūḍhaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:111_5: sā ca vṛkṣaśākhā viśīrṇā. sa pāṣāṇaśilāyāṃ patitaḥ kālagataḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:111_6: tatra mahājanakāyo rudati. atha bhikṣavo divāvihāraṃ gatāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:111_8: bhagavann aho anityatā. atrodyāne gṛhapatiputro bālo 'bhuktabhogo 'śokavṛkṣāt patitaḥ kālagatah.
SA01mkarmviu:111_9: tatra mahājanakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ rauravasadṛśaś ca śabdaḥ śrūyate.
SA01mkarmviu:111_10: bhagavān āha. eṣa eva bhikṣavaḥ gṛhapatiputraḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudre 'nyatarasmiṃ nāgakule upapannaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:111_11: sa tatra jātamātra eva strīsahitaḥ krīḍamāno garuḍenoddhṛtya bhakṣitaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:111_12: tatra nāgakanyā rudanti iha striyo rudanti.
SA01mkarmviu:111_13: sa ca yasyāḥ striyā vacanenāśokavṛkṣam ārūḍhas tasyopary āghātaṃ kṛtavān.

SA01mkarmviu:173_2: kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhate.
SA01mkarmviu:173_5: ye cakṣuṣmantas te samaviṣamāṇi rūpāṇi paśyantu.
SA01mkarmviu:175_0: atrāryāniruddhasya dīpe divyacakṣur ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cakṣūtpāṭanamokṣāyaṇe vaktavyam.
SA01mkarmviu:175_2: yā ca śrāvastyāṃ cakṣuvikalena pradīpamālā kāritā.
SA01mkarmviu:175_3: saprasādo jātaḥ. praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān. utthitasya cāsya yathā paurāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃvṛttam.
SA01mkarmviu:176_2: ucyate. gandhabhūto bhavati lokasya. ghrāṇendriyaṃ viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyam apaiti. saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati. daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ pravāti.
SA01mkarmviu:176_3: abhigamanīyo bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām.
SA01mkarmviu:177_1: kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya romakūpebhyaḥ śarīrād gandho nirgacchati.
SA01mkarmviu:177_2: tadyathā gandhasamudgakasya. dīrgharātraṃ tayā striyā caityagarbhagṛheṣu gandhopalepanāni dattāni.
SA01mkarmviu:177_3: surabhīṇi ca puṣpāṇi dhūpaś ca dattāḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:177_5: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya śarīrād evaṃrūpo gandho nirgacchati.
SA01mkarmviu:177_6: tadyathā gandhakaraṇḍasya. ime daśa guṇā gandhapradānasya.
SA01mkarmviu:178_5: buddhagocaraṃ sevate. bālagocaraṃ vivarjayati. durgatigamanīyān dharmān vivarjayati.
SA01mkarmviu:178_7: devā asya spṛhayanti. nityaṃ sugatavacane pravrajyāṃ pratilabhate.
SA01mkarmviu:179_1: ucyate. saṃgaṇikā vivarjayati. pravivekaṃ sevate. dhyānālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:179_3: buddhānāṃ smṛtiṃ yāti. prītisukhasaumanasyaṃ kāyo na jahāti.
SA01mkarmviu:179_4: antarāyāś ca na bhavanti. brahmacaryasya alpāyāsena samādhim adhigacchati.
SA01mkarmviu:180_2: gocaro 'sya prahato bhavati. māno 'sya nihato [MKV_105] bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:180_3: ātmānaṃ lābhena yojayati. parān puṇye pratiṣṭhāpayati. śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayati. paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:180_6: piṇḍapātaparacittasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā diśo 'pratikūlā bhavanti gamanāya.
SA01mkarmviu:181_0: LXXX. daśa vaiśāradyāni. katamāni daśa. ucyate. viśārado grāmaṃ praviśati. viśārado grāmān niṣkrāmati. viśāradaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte.
